com.guidewire.util.internal
Class DependenciesBase

java.lang.Object
  com.guidewire.util.internal.DependenciesBase

public abstract class DependenciesBase
extends java.lang.Object

Base class for managing dependencies. All "Dependencies" classes should extend from this class.

Author:
pdalbora

getDependencyIgnoringInitializationFlag

protected <T> T getDependencyIgnoringInitializationFlag(java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
Gets the dependency instance registered for the given dependency interface, regardless of whether these dependencies are "initializing." This is a hack to work around the fact that some dependencies ignore the "initializing" flag, which is itself a clunky way of avoiding circular dependency issues.
